head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths ELLWOOD, RALPH W.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths ELLWOOD, RALPH W.

block.p: ELLWOOD-Ralph W. On September 26, 1998. Beloved husband of the late Johanna. Loving father of Brenda Reale, Robert John, Marie Alice Sanderson and the late Ralph, Jr. Devoted brother of William, Marion Cuite and the late Catherine. Also survived by 12 grandchildren and three greatgrandchildren. Reposing at the Beney Funeral Home of Syosset, 79 Berry Hill Rd., Sunday, 2-5 and 7-9 PM. Funeral mass Monday, 10 AM, St. Edward's R.C. Church. Interment Nassau Knolls Cemetery.
